title: Mauritius Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in Mauritius increased to 125.69 points in October from 125.05 points in September of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in Mauritius averaged 54.59 points from 1980 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 125.69 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 9.85 points in January of 1980. In Mauritius, the Consumer Price Index or CPI measures changes in the prices paid by consumers for a basket of goods and services. This page provides - Mauritius Consumer Price Index (CPI) - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Statistics Office, Mauritius
